info.description: This is the API documentation for the Coursify application.
info.title: Coursify API

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users regardless of their status.
Retrieves a list of users with 'pending' status.
Retrieves the number of users with 'pending' status.
Retrieves key statistics like total, active, and pending users.
Retrieves the full details of a single user by their ID.
get.summary: Get a single user's details (Admin only)

put.description: Updates a user's full_name, email, or role.
Changes a user's status from 'pending' to 'active'.
Changes a user's status from 'pending' to 'rejected'.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all courses created by the logged-in instructor.

post.description: Creates a new course for the logged-in instructor.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific course owned by the logged-in instructor.

put.description: Updates the title and description of a course owned by the logged-in instructor.

get.description: Retrieves all learning materials for a specific course.

post.description: Adds a new learning material to a specific course.
post.summary: Add material to a course (Instructor only)

put.description: Updates a specific learning material within a course.

delete.description: Deletes a specific learning material from a course.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information for the currently logged-in user.

post.description: Creates a new user account with a 'pending' status.

valid.description: Valid is true if String is not NULL

BearerAuth.description: "Type 'Bearer' followed by a space and a JWT token."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
